title: Verify: Selecting MLB.TV app icon successfully opens the MLB.TV app
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their device
AND the "MLB.TV" app is present in the device Apps Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects MLB.TV from the device's Apps menu
custom_expected: THEN the MLB.TV app will open successfully

title: Verify: MLB.TV can be accessed while the device is connected wirelessly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their device
AND their device is currently connected to a wireless network
AND the "MLB.TV" app is present in the device Apps Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects MLB.TV from the device Apps menu
custom_expected: THEN the MLB.TV app will open successfully

title: Verify: MLB.TV can be accessed while the device is connected using a wired connection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their device
AND the "MLB.TV" app is present in the device Apps Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects MLB.TV from the device Apps menu
custom_expected: THEN the MLB.TV app will open successfully

title: Free User / Non-Entitlement account is allowed to Log into Application
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND a Free MLB.com User account has been created
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a Free MLB.com User account (upon Login request)
AND enters the Free MLB.com User account password
custom_expected: Free User / Non- Entitlement account is allowed to Log into Application

title: Free User / Non-Entitlement account is allowed to play FGOTD Live/VOD archive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Free User / Non- Entitlement account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Any Date (up to and including Today's FGOTD file) that contains FGOTD Assets
AND navigates through the Content File Thumbnails for FGOTD assets
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the FGOTD media content
custom_expected: Playback will be initiated for any/all available FGOTD Live/VOD archive file(s)

title: FGOTD Ads trigger - Pre-Roll Ads Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Free User / Non- Entitlement account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Any Date (up to and including Today's FGOTD file) that contains FGOTD Assets
AND navigates through the Content File Thumbnails for FGOTD assets
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the FGOTD media content
custom_expected: FGOTD Asset must Show Freewheel served pre-roll video ads to user before Playback begins

title: Trigger - Recaps Ads Playback (if applicable)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Free User / Non- Entitlement account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates through Content Files 
AND the user selects Any previous Game Date that contains Game Recaps Assets from previously played games 
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the Recaps media content
custom_expected: Recaps Asset must Show Freewheel served video ads to user before Recaps playback begins

title: Non-FGOTD Gameday Sign-in Notification for Free User/Non-Entitlement account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Free User / Non- Entitlement account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to a non-FGOTD
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the game
custom_expected:
The user should see an ALERT that a subscription is required
AND a selectable button that takes the user to the Paywall

title: Premium Monthly account entitlement is allowed to Log into Application
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND a Monthly MLB.com User account has been purchased/entitled
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a Premium Monthly MLB.com User account (upon Login request)
AND enters the Premium Monthly MLB.com User account password
custom_expected: THE Premium Monthly account entitlement is allowed to Log into Application

title: Premium Monthly account entitlement is allowed to play Live/VOD archive games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Premium Monthly account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Any Date that contains Game Content Assets
AND navigates through the Content File Thumbnails for Game Content Assets
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the MLB.TV Game media content
custom_expected: THE Premium Monthly account entitlement is allowed to play Live/VOD archive games

title: Premium Yearly account entitlement is allowed to Log into Application
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND a Yearly MLB.com User account has been purchased/entitled
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a Premium Yearly MLB.com User account (upon Login request)
AND enters the Premium Yearly MLB.com User account password
custom_expected: THE Premium yearly account entitlement is allowed to Log into Application

title: Premium Annual account entitlement is allowed to play ALL Live/VOD archive games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Premium Yearly account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Any Date that contains Game Content Assets
AND navigates through the Content File Thumbnails for Game Content Assets
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the MLB.TV Game media content
custom_expected:
THE Premium Annual account entitlement is allowed to play ALL VOD archive games
AND all (non-blackout) Live games

title: Single team account entitlement is allowed to play Live Audio feed for their team
custom_preconds: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/CDANDMSFT/2016+Single+Team+Test+Accounts

title: Single team account entitlement is allowed to play Live Video feed for their team; if not blacked out
custom_preconds: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/CDANDMSFT/2016+Single+Team+Test+Accounts

title: Single team account entitlement is allowed to play team's feed of VOD archive games
custom_preconds: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/CDANDMSFT/2016+Single+Team+Test+Accounts

title: Single team account entitlement is NOT allowed to play opposing team's feed of VOD archive games
custom_expected: note: Unless it's a Free game of the day

title: Executive account entitlement is allowed to play ALL Live/VOD archive games; no blackouts of any kind
custom_preconds:
Executive account:
media6@mlbtest.com

pw: (ask Liz Addis)
custom_steps:
test - 
Recaps
VOD game: Home feed, Away feed, National/International feed (ex: All-star game or World Series), MLB PLUS, Free Game of the Day
Live: Home, Away, National/International, MLB PLUS, Free Game of the Day

spring training games(?)
custom_expected: Exec is allowed access to all feeds

title: Functionality: Select/Confirm Button
Functionality: Menu Button (AFTV only)
Functionality: Return/Back Button
Wired Connection: Launch and playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the MLB.TV their Amazon Fire TV device (Console Only) connected to a wired network connection
AND the user has accessed the "MLB.TV" Application
custom_steps:
WHEN the USER locates any game media content file
AND the USER attempts to play ANY game media content file
custom_expected:
THEN the game media video stream will launch successfully
AND the game media content file will play without issue

title: Wireless Connection: Launch and playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the MLB.TV Amazon Fire TV device (Stick or Console) connected to a wireless network connection
AND the user has accessed the "MLB.TV" Application
custom_steps:
WHEN the USER locates any game media content file
AND the USER attempts to play ANY game media content file
custom_expected:
THEN the game media video stream will launch successfully
AND the game media content file will play without issue

title: Full VOD Archive Playback to Exit
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have accessed the "MLB.TV" application
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch ANY ARCHIVE/VOD video feed with a TRT > 2mins
AND watch to completion
custom_expected:
THEN playback will commence and continue without stalls or skips
AND the user will not be kicked out of the stream unexpectedly
AND upon completion the app will return to Schedule (asset) page

title: Full Live Game Linear Playback to Exit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "MLB.TV" application
AND the USER is signed in with a Premium Monthly OR Yearly account entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch ANY LIVE video feed with a TRT > 2mins
AND watch to completion
custom_expected:
THEN playback will commence and continue without stalls or skips
AND the user will not be kicked out of the stream unexpectedly
AND upon completion the app will return to Schedule (asset) page

title: Seek FWD to Exit - VOD Archive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "MLB.TV" application
AND the USER is signed in with a Premium Monthly OR Yearly account entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN the USER launches a VOD Archive video feed
AND seek to the END of video
custom_expected: THEN the video will transition from playback and return to the Schedule (asset) page gracefully

title: Seek BACK (RWD) to Front of Program
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "MLB.TV" application
AND the USER is signed in with a Premium Monthly OR Yearly account entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN the USER launches a VOD Archive video feed
AND seek FWD > 10 mins into program
AND allow > 30 secs of playback
AND seek BACK (RWD) to head of program
custom_expected: THEN the video will resume playback from beginning and continue without issue

title: Scores On: Clickable Linescore
Live game (scores on): Clickable Linescore updates as game progresses
Live game (scores on): Boxscore updates as game progresses
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "MLB.TV" application
AND are signed in with an account (premium, free, exec, single team, etc.)
AND have launched a Live game we are entitled to view
AND *media player UI is displayed on screen 
* open video player UI (by pressing nav or playback UI buttons on remote)
custom_steps:
WHEN we select BOX SCORE button 
AND Box score opens
custom_expected:
THEN we are able to toggle between Pitching and Batting Stats
And user is able to toggle between Home and Away team stats
AND they will update in real time as the game progresses

title: Network: Verify bandwidth/stream quality adapts with network fluctuations
Network: Verify video quality improves with connectivity improvement
Network: Verify when throttling connection strength that bitrate playback adjusts without issue in both directions
Video Playback: Wired Connection Lost ***
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Video Stream is successfully playing full screen
AND the their Amazon Fire TV device (Console Only) is connected to a wired network connection
custom_steps: WHEN we disconnect the LAN from the wall
custom_expected: THEN the expected fail message appears

title: Video Playback: Wireless Connection Lost ***
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Video Stream is successfully playing full screen
AND the Amazon Fire TV device (Stick or Console) is connected to an Ad Hoc wifi network
custom_steps: WHEN we turn off the Ad Hoc wifi network
custom_expected: THEN the expected fail message appears

title: Video Playback: Wireless Connection - No Data (Blocked) ***
custom_preconds: ATV/Proxy network setup and set up test scenario when data is choked

custom_preconds:
GIVEN we are navigating through the MLB.TV App's sub-menu pages 
AND the Amazon Fire TV device (Console Only) is connected to a wired network connection
custom_steps: WHEN we disconnect the LAN from the wall
custom_expected: THEN the expected fail message appears

custom_preconds:
GIVEN we are navigating through the MLB.TV App's sub-menu pages 
AND the Amazon Fire TV device (Stick or Console) is connected to an Ad Hoc wifi network

title: Verify All available dates - Years/Months are visible in sub-menu page displays

Verify Sign-Out/Sign-In sub-menu functionality (from Settings Menu)
Verify Spoilers (Hide/Show Scores) functionality
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "MLB.TV" application
AND the USER is signed in with an active account
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate Hide Scores from the Settings Menu
AND select ON
custom_expected:
Then the App should not show the scores of individual games on the Scores view
And the Standings view should not display records
